root.name: Transformers Tatakai
root.description: OverviewTransformers Tatakai is an action game released by Japanese toy-maker Takara for the PlayStation 2. It is based on the Generation One Transformers. This covers the pre and post movie characters, as well as characters exclusive to the Japanese Generation One cartoons. Players can play on either the Autobot side or the Decepticon side.CharactersPlayers start out with either an Autobot side consisting of Optimus Prime, Wheeljack and Jazz or a Decepticon side, consisting of Megatron, Soundwave and Starscream. They are soon joined by, Rodimus Prime, Arcec, Kup, Galvatron, Cyclonus, and Scourage. Other Transformers are unlocked as the story progresses. On the Autobot side, Ratchet, Bumblebee, Hound, and the Trainbots. On the Decepticon side Astrotrain, Blitzwing, Shockwave, and Sixshot.StoryThe story takes place on the planet Zel. The Autobots are looking for an Autobot team that had gone to look for a UFO. The Decepticons are there and the Autobots defend the planet from them. Then Rodimus Prime, Arcee and Kup show up from the future, explaining that they must stop the Decepticons from finding the crystal Zel Quartz. With the crystal, Shockwave has unlimited power and has been on a killing rampage in the futrue. Galvatron and his Decepticons have also traveled back in time to get the Zel Quartz.
